Explosions.label: Explosions enabled?
Explosions.tooltip: Explosions deal damage to shields if the campfire is too high.

ShieldThreshold.label: Shield Cost
ShieldThreshold.tooltip: How high the campfire has to be before a shield is created

ExplosionThreshold.label: Explosion Threshold
ExplosionThreshold.tooltip: Explosions happen if the campfire is at or above this threshold after an attack.

SafetyThreshold.label: Safety Threshold
SafetyThreshold.tooltip: Threshold at which the creation of a shield or an explosion stops.

CritEnabled.label: Crits enabled?
CritEnabled.tooltip: Crits add a layer of uncertainty to votes. When paired wtih explosions, they result in a lof of badness.

CritDestruction.label: Crits can destroy vote options?
CritDestruction.tooltip: Allows critical hits to destroy vote options permanently if the target it small enough.

MaximumAttack.label: Maximum attack value
MaximumAttack.tooltip: The pre-modification value of the Campfire's maximum attack rolls.

MinimumAttack.label: Minimum attack value
MinimumAttack.tooltip: The pre-modification value of the Campfire's minimum attack rolls.

DelayMultiplier.label: Damage to time multiplier
DelayMultiplier.tooltip: The number of seconds each damage point is worth. Each point of damage done during the last attack adds this many seconds of a delay.
